name: “International Summit on Hematology and Blood disorders” (Hematology 2023)
content: Magnus Group proudly presents its hybrid event “International Summit on Hematology and Blood disorders” (Hematology 2023) which will be hosted at during April 27-29, 2023 and will focus on the theme “Transfusing Innovations and Exploring Emerging Concepts in Hematology.” This two-day hematology meeting will give you the opportunity to talk with renowned haematology experts about fast changing advances in the area, learn about novel therapies for patients, and enhance your overall practise approaches. The hematology congress will assist our attendees and delegates by offering tools and guidance that suit global needs, as well as assist them in the establishment of strong communities to enhance worldwide education, research, and awareness on haematology and blood related disorders. This hematology meeting will provide a global platform for sharing ideas and developing solutions by sharing knowledge across countries and specialties to support the development of best practise, and by working together to provide resources that enable the development of a new generation of advocates, activists, practitioners, and researchers in the global context. Oral and poster presentations, keynote forums, plenary talks, symposiums, and exhibitions are all part of the conference.
